title: Caught by the Pool Boy
description: Pool boy by day. Rock star by night.   Well, not quite. We're just in a rut. Something big is around the cornerâ€”I can feel it.  In the meantime, I need a distraction. And that MILF across the pool might just be it. The way her lips wrap around that straw in her drink, I can only imagine how they'll feel wrapped around my...  Well. I've never been afraid of going for what I want. And what I want is her.
author: Tatum Wilde
